titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation to restraine the excessiue carriages in vvagons and foure wheeled carts, to the destruction of the high-wayes
Proclamations. 1622-08-06
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Windsor, the sixt day of August; in the yeeres of our reigne .. the twentieth ..
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
